answers.author: Chase Carlile
answers.text:
The Town of Flower Mound, Texas allocates funding for neighborhood improvement projects where the funds go towards replacing, or installing perimeter fencing around subdivisions that abut major thoroughfares. For more information you can contact Mike Zapata at 972.874.6336.

author: Victoria Runkle
text: Does your city have a program(s) to replace fences using a combination of property tax options and city shared sources?  Aurora CO has a program where neighbors can form a Special Improvement District or a General Improvement District, and they tax themselves for attractive fences.   I am simply attempting to conduct a survey of what other cities might have to help residents replace fences.  Thank you.
title: Fence program
